sub_title: PhD | Project Manager (PMP) | Researcher (Affective Computing) | Software Developer | Entrepreneur
summary:
Thank you for visiting my LinkedIn profile. My name is Deniz Iren. I have been working in the IT industry over 13 years as a project manager and a software engineer. I have a PhD in Information Systems and a master's degree in Software Management. My areas of expertise include crowdsourcing, human computation, business process management, and natural language processing. I am fascinated about combining scientific research with industrial value. Thus, I am always looking for collaborations with R&D organizations and scientific institutes. Feel free to contact me if you think we can collaborate.   
 
CERTIFICATIONS
* PMI-ACP (PMI Agile Certified Practitioner), 2012
* PMP (Project Management Professional), 2009
* Professional Scrum Master, 2011
* PY (Sertifikalı Proje Yöneticisi), 2008

RESEARCH FOCUS
* Crowdsourcing, Collective Intelligence, Human Computation, Social Software
* Agile Software Development, Agile Management, Project Management Offices
* Social Media Analysis, 
* Human Computer Interaction, Usability, User Experience
* Business Process Management, Business Process Modeling, Enterprise Ontology
* Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning, Deep Learning

CONTACT INFO
deniziren@gmail.com
deniz@kitlekaynak.net
+31658744960

I have worked as a postdoctoral researcher in the Business Informatics Research Group at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam. In this position, I worked closely with a consultancy organization and a major telecommunications company. I developed a method and software for matching business requirements to corporate business processes using Natural Language Processing (NLP), text mining techniques and enterprise semantics. This method and the software enables organizations to build an infrastructure for continuous requirements engineering and impact analyses continuously.  
The method also includes Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) based clustering of requirement statements. This allows organizations to cluster new and existing requirements in groups for scope management and impact analysis. 

KEYWORDS
Natural Language Processing, Named Entity Recognition, Stanford Parser, Text Analytics, Wordnet, Machine Learning, Mallet, Semantic Web, Linked Data, OWL, RDF, Enterprise Ontology, Business Process Management (BPM), BPMN, ARIS, ADONIS, JAVA, Confluence, JIRA, BitBucket, MySQL, MSSQL, and R. 

RESEARCH OUTPUT
Iren, D., Reijers, H.A.; 2017. "Leveraging Business Process Improvement with Natural Language Processing and Organizational Semantic Knowledge" in ICSSP 2017. In Press.', 'title': 'Postdoctoral Researcher', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 166529, 'name': 'TU Delft', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFwaGpwaod9mQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1670699851986?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=772a-buTMRhp4JFw5Lp2WIlZQJ_rGzWG5O_wmvG3oQQ', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/tudelft/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Delft Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Delft University of Technology', 'description': 'As a postdoctoral researcher, I have worked in the Music Atlas Project. I was responsible for analyzing social media data, integrating various online information sources, coordinating a team of researchers, establishing ground truth based on crowdsourcing, and publishing the research findings. The goal of the project was to uncover the music listening patterns of subcultures in an urban context by analyzing the social media data streams. 

KEYWORDS
Social Media Analysis, Crowdsourcing, Python, PHP, Javascript, PostgreSQL, Twitter API, Geonames API, Spotify API, Last.fm API, Amazon Mechanical Turk, Google Maps API, PostgreSQL, MySQL, and R.', 'title': 'Postdoctoral Researcher', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 15106709, 'name': 'Orta Doğu Teknik Üniversitesi / Middle East Technical University', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4D0BAQGKAGYwZHJA_g/company-logo_400_400/0/1687336541224?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=9LF83KnfTEXhhayABzgsUa2xjoJLslW88Reuh3xgqVQ', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/orta-dogu-teknik-universitesi/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Computer Center', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Orta Doğu Teknik Üniversitesi / Middle East Technical University', 'description': 'I worked as a project/program manager in the Computer Center of the Middle East Technical University (METU). The Integrated Information Systems (IIS) project is the largest IT investment that the university has ever undertaken in its 60 years of history. The aim of this project was to integrate all information systems within the campus, as well as the data sources. We worked with several supplier firms, consultants, and the public administration institutes. 

My responsibilities included planning, monitoring the execution, coordinating a large number of stakeholders, and participating in the acquisition of products and services. As a firm believer in agile practices, I guided the organization into establishing an agile culture. We used a tailored Scrum approach in our work within the organization and with the supplier parties. I also lead the establishment of a Project Management Office (PMO) in the organization. The PMO acted as a management-level think-tank and allowed the organization to manage different projects in synergy. More specifically, we established a central repository of risks and metrics to be used by the managers of different projects within the organization. We also specified a resource competency registry within the functional organization units, and made the expertise available to cross-functional projects. I lead the definition of the policies and service level agreements of the PMO.

HIGHLIGHTS
* Establishing the Project Management Office,
* Leading an agile transformation,
* Establishing governance & service management practices (ITIL, Cobit),
* Managing the acquisition, development, and integration of SOA Infrastructure for the University,
* Analyzing, modeling, and automating business processes.', 'title': 'Program Manager', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 18026549, 'name': 'Mikrokom', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEbQI00BltMJg/company-logo_400_400/0/1519878758436?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=zz2DW8YSqKvA86MdflLtp0OdDZySFiq5YsIguMTdfiE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/mikrokom/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2005}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}}, 'company': 'MikroKom Yazılım A.Ş.', 'description': 'I was responsible of
